meanings.definition: A state of disuse or inactivity.
meanings.sent1: The old playground fell into desuetude after the new one was built.
meanings.sent2: The desuetude of the abandoned factory was a sad sight.
meanings.sent3: The desuetude of the forgotten toy brought a smile to the child's face.
meanings.sent4: The desuetude of the neglected garden was a metaphor for the passing of time.
meanings.sent5: The desuetude of the dusty bookshop made it feel like a forgotten treasure trove.

meanings.definition: The condition of something no longer being used or practiced.
meanings.sent1: The desuetude of the old tradition was evident during the modern festival.
meanings.sent2: The desuetude of the ancient language was a barrier to communication.
meanings.sent3: The desuetude of the vintage car made it a charming relic.
meanings.sent4: The desuetude of the worn-out shoes symbolized the end of a journey.
meanings.sent5: The desuetude of the dusty attic revealed forgotten treasures.
